name: Slimey wants to eat
description:
Mini Game built for the My First Game Jam Winter 2023. 

This game is currently a draft and unfortunately the web-version is working only in chromium based web-browsers. If you do not have a chromium based browser, you can still play the game by downloading the zip for your platform. :-)

Your goal is to eat food to get Slimey to the correct size to fill out the target platform and position yourself on the target platform.

The color of the flags indicate the size you need for certain obstacles.

You have a limited amount of time to finish each level and are not allowed to fall of the world. If you don't manage to finish a level or fall of, you can restart the level with [R]

Bots can be pushed and can also fall of the world.

Controls: WASD Restart Level: R

-------

Credits:

Art and Programming was done by myself. The font was bought and itch.io and for the music I used songs from freesound.org that are under the creative commons license.
